d: edited
e: earned
o: earned online
t: type
x: show as secret if not yet achieved

Wordament
=========
Assuming that the ? flags are something to do with the system the game is played on. Initially thought it might be mobile vs console/PC, but Win8 shares the flag at 0x400000 with Android and iOS, while Windows Phone 8 has 0x200000 set.

Android (4d531468)
?-d--eo------------xttt
10000100000000000001001
10000100000000000001010

WP8 (4d5313da)
-?d--eo------------xttt
01100110000000000001001
01100110000000000001010
01100110000000000001101

Windows 8 (4d530a3a)
?-d--eo------------xttt
10100110000000000001001
10100110000000000001010
10100110000000000001101

iOS (4d531467)
?-d--eo------------xttt
10000100000000000001001
10000100000000000001010


Microsoft Mahjong
=================

WP8 (4d53148e)
-?d--eo------------xttt
01100110000000000001001

Windows 8 (4d5313f1)
?-d--eo------------xttt
10100110000000000001001


Microsoft Minesweeper
=====================

Windows 8 (4d5313f2)
?-d--eo------------xttt
00000000000000000001001
10100110000000000001001

WP8 (4d53148f)
-?d--eo------------xttt
01100110000000000001001


Viva Pinata
===========

GFWL (4d530841)
-?d--eo------------xttt
01000100000000000000100
01000100000000000001100
01000110000000000000100
01000110000000000001100

01000110000000000001100
01000110000000000001110
